title: Gmail notifications
content:
Hello, 

As of a couple of weeks ago, i completely stopped receiving gmail notifications to my phone. I only see ne emails if i manually open the app and refresh. I have tried:
Deselecting and reselecting notification settings (which, btw, i never changed in the first place) 
Clearing app cache
Removing account and adding again 

I need to be able to see certain emails right away, please help!
